title: I feel that I've been repeatedly griefed by 4-man premade teams...

replies.body:
If you're talking about ranked soloq then 4mans are statistically about as likely as Half Life 3.
If you're talking about normals then that's jsut YOU queuing solo and if you get a 4man doushesquad you gotta deal with it

We've all been that solo player with the 4man premade. Not a good experience. Usually the best thing to do is just mute the entire team and communicate through pings. If they rage/throw the game, just focus on yourself. You'll make mistakes, they'll try get you killed, but at the end of the game, it's just about you focusing on how well you're playing and how well you can read the in-game situation as the game progresses.

It's easy to say, I know, but with time you'll get used to it better :)

Once EVERYONE on my team dc'd except for me, so I told the enemy team and they just fast pushed and finished. I ended up getting a bunch of honours too since I sat at base and joked with their team. Anyway that's the only bad experience I have with 4 man premades.
With such a small player base having true 'solo que' normal games would ridiculously hard and not really worth the time you would have to wait in que.
either you're a dumb**a**ss, or you're talking about norms. either way, no.
